subject: Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
Hockey, Ice
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: In a case that could raise Title IX and gender-equity issues, Minnesota-Duluth decided to part ways with the highest-paid women’s hockey coach in Division I.
snippet: In a case that could raise Title IX and gender-equity issues, Minnesota-Duluth decided to part ways with the highest-paid women’s hockey coach in Division I.
